title: Ginger ButterLime Ginger Butter
directions: Use a fork to cream all the ingredients to gether, cover and store in fridge or freeze until you want to use it.
Stir all ingredients together in a small bowl until smooth. Shape into a cylinder 2 1/2" wide, and wrap in plastic wrap or foil.
Put in refrigerator until firm, about 1 hour. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 (1 1/2 inch) piece fresh ginger, finely minced
